name: Race To The Sky
description:
Race to the Sky

A Two Player Competitive Endless Platformer

How to Play

  • Use "WASD" and Arrow Keys to control the 2 characters.
  • If you fall below the camera you lose a life!
  • Lose 3 lives and you Lose!!

Created by Maddie and Ryan

...with art from PixelFrog (pixelfrog-assets.itch.io)

...and music from Magic-Spark (magic-spark.itch.io)

...and sound effects from JDWasabi (jdwasabi.itch.io)
